text:
@LauraCat76 "No, later, in a few months. Until then, we'll enjoy Skype, Duo, FaceTime or whichever video call provider we both like." 

If it hurts your sisterly vibe for awhile, that's regrettable, yes. 

But ppl dead of COVID-19 wouldn't be able to heal a rift later, would they? 
You will.
